name: Drak Fighting - Man Kung Fu
description:
Drak Fighting - Man Kung Fu is fast-paced action fighting in classic arcade games style! This nostalgia game with realistic physics and bright 3D graphics wouldn't leave you disappointed!
Features:
- Fast-paced brawling action Beat 'em up game!
- Unique brutal rage combo strikes!
- Great visual and sound fighting effects!
- Devastating weapons: baseball bat, knife and pistol!
